item.title: LVM tips
item.description: resize / increase lvm lvextend --size +10G /dev/vg0/foo lvextend --size 20G /dev/vg0/foo lvdisplay /dev/vg0/foo http://www.microhowto.info/howto/increase_the_size_of_an_lvm_logical_volume.html https://linoxide.com/linux-how-to/lvm-configuration-linux/ pvresize pvresize /dev/sda3 https://www.thegeekdiary.com/centos-rhel-how-to-resize-extend-existing-physical-volume-pv/
